definition: building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: Hideyoshi himself brought along two portable teahouses in starkly contrasting styles.
sentences.chinese: 豐臣秀吉本人帶來了兩個風格截然不同的便攜式茶館。

sentences.english: A small tea-house where only tea and pies can be bought.
sentences.chinese: 一間只賣茶和餡餅的小茶館。

sentences.english: So what do people do in these teahouses?
sentences.chinese: 那麼人們在茶館裏都做些什麼呢？

sentences.english: Tongliao Museum of Han Shan tea this beef jerky, 25 pound.
sentences.chinese: 通遼的罕山奶茶館有這種牛肉乾，25一斤。

sentences.english: An egg had tea in a caff , as a result, it became a tea-leaf egg.
sentences.chinese: 有一個雞蛋去茶館喝茶，結果它變成了茶葉蛋。

sentences.english: Wuli only long tea house on the Street has more than ten business is booming.
sentences.chinese: 僅五里長的老街上茶館就有十多家，生意頗爲興隆。

sentences.english: How about going to the teahouse at Wangjiang Tower Park?
sentences.chinese: 去望江公園的老茶館喝茶怎麼樣？

sentences.english: She fell off a long footbridge near the teahouse.
sentences.chinese: 她在茶館附近，自一座很長的人行橋上跌落下去。

sentences.english: He was fascinated by Sichuan Opera performances in Chengdu's teahouses.
sentences.chinese: 之後，他對成都茶館裏的川劇表演着了迷。

sentences.english: The likes of me won't be able to afford a seat in such a posh teahouse.
sentences.chinese: 像我這樣的人算是坐不起這樣的茶館了。

sentences.english: This is a performance in a teahouse of Beijing .
sentences.chinese: 這是北京老茶館裏上演的一段表演，清朝宮廷舞。

sentences.english: Senior citizens in South China may speed their whole day in teahouses.
sentences.chinese: 在中國南方，老人們可以一整天呆在茶館裏。

sentences.english: Tea culture is a special form of culture with a decidedly Beijing touch about it.
sentences.chinese: 茶館文化是極具中國京味特色的文化。

sentences.english: Another dust-up took place in the teahouse.
sentences.chinese: 茶館裏又發生了一場打鬥。

sentences.english: Guo Degang recently had the audience in stitches at a teahouse in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 在北京小茶館兒裏，郭德綱常常把觀衆們逗得笑岔氣。

sentences.english: It asks us the teahouse as the centre of the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 它叫我們茶館作爲街坊四鄰的活動中心。

definition: building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
